name: Second Brain | Notion Template
description: Hey! Get ready to spin up your Second Brain - Harness your digital intake & expand your creative output.Total Downloads: 18,000+ Read the TestimonialsThis is a template for the Second Brain methodology developed by Tiago Forte. This template is divided into 4 main databases Projects, Areas, Resources, and Archive (following the P.A.R.A system)There are 2 auxiliary databases, Knowledge Hub and Notes.Who Is this for Entrepreneurs,Small Businesses CreativesStudentsAnyone using Notion to organis
features: Entrepreneurs,; Small Businesses; Anyone using Notion to organise their digital information and increase their creative output.; Increase creative output vs passive consumption through a process of C.O.D.E; Organise your notes in notion using the PARA framework; Build 'Intermediate packets' lego bricks you can use over and over again to complete projects.
